text:
Question 126) Doubt Two Compadres traveled by car along a farm road when a animal crossed the front of the car. One of the Compadres said, "He spent a wide there!" The other asked, "Lizard or wide?" The first one answered, "I don't know, the animal passed very fast."
Colorful jokes. Rio de Janeiro: Gender, 2006.
In the joke, the breaking of expectation contributes to producing the mood effect. This effect occurs because one of the characters
A) Recognizes the species of the animal signed.
B) has doubt about the pronunciation of the reptile's name.
C) disregards the linguistic content of the question.
D) find the fact that a animal crosses the front of the car.
E) presents two possibilities of meaning for the same word.
